work.summary: Developing multi-modal LLM-based key information extraction systems.
highlights: Integrated multi-modal LLM for document key information extraction.
Optimized prompt templates for efficient extraction.
Enhanced dataset annotation platform with new tools.
Introduced dataset versioning using Hugging Face datasets.
Developed document-agnostic key information extraction system.

Optimized deep learning models for face and vehicle recognition.

Implemented active learning techniques for object detection.
